txt.en: The Abyss of Mordath: A Light in the Darkness

In the darkness of the Abyss of Mordath, it is the Bitter Warden who protects the most well-concealed secrets of the Dark Lord, but his identity has ever been a mystery to both the slaves and guards of the Mordath.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Abyss of Mordath raid.</rgb>
Complete 'Challenge: A Light in the Darkness'

In the darkness of the Abyss of Mordath, it is the Bitter Warden who protects the most well-concealed secrets of the Dark Lord, but his identity has ever been a mystery to both the slaves and guards of the Mordath.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Abyss of Mordath raid.</rgb>
You have completed 'Challenge: A Light in the Darkness'.
